title: Tata, MG offer free charging, battery rentals to lure EV buyers
description: Tata Motors and MG Motor are introducing new strategies to boost electric vehicle sales in India. Tata offers free charging and discounts, while MG Motor launches a battery rental plan. These efforts aim to make EVs more affordable amid high prices and limited charging facilities, addressing the faltering sales growth.
